actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To enhance the prospects for economic development in rural areas by allowing municipal corporations to acquire through eminent domain utility facilities of rural water supply or sewer service corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit a municipal corporation or utility to use eminent domain to acquire the property, or to be the exclusive provider of services, of rural water or sewer associations under specified conditions.

titles.title: To enhance the prospects for economic development in rural areas by allowing municipal corporations to acquire through eminent domain utility facilities of rural water supply or sewer service corporations.
